content: curvy leaf designed by kerri sanders nov 15 2020 materials worsted weight yarn 4 5mm hook leaf measures 3 25 long x 1/75 wide yarn needle abbreviations chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st / sts - stitch/stitches treble_crochet - treble stitch curvy leaf pattern chain 10 work along one side of the chain beginning in the 2nd loop half_double_crochet double_crochet 4 treble_crochet half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch into same st turn work back along the other side of the chain 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2dc in next chain 2 treble_crochet in next chain 2 treble_crochet in next chain treble_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch into 1st half_double_crochet finish off leaving a long tail to attach your leaf to any project you wish kerri copyright 2020 kerri sanders all rights reserved this free pattern may be printed for personal use only you may not in any form reproduce or distribute this pattern in part or in whole through any venue electronic mechanical or otherwise without the written authorization of the publisher you may use this pattern to sell the finished product for profit on a limited basis only iyou may sell items made from this pattern but i would appreciate acknowledgement as the designer thank you so much
